## Overall Assessment

### Scoring Summary

| Criterion | Score (1-5) | Weight | Weighted Score |
|-----------|-------------|--------|----------------|
| Framework Alignment | [X] | 25% | [X * 0.25] |
| User Value & Impact | [X] | 30% | [X * 0.30] |
| Technical Feasibility | [X] | 20% | [X * 0.20] |
| Resource Requirements | [X] | 15% | [X * 0.15] |
| Strategic Fit | [X] | 10% | [X * 0.10] |
| **TOTAL** | - | **100%** | **[Total]** |

**Overall Score**: `[X.XX / 5.00]`

### Score Interpretation

- **4.0 - 5.0**: Strongly Recommended - High priority for implementation
- **3.0 - 3.9**: Recommended - Good idea, prioritize based on resources
- **2.0 - 2.9**: Consider - May be valuable, needs refinement or better timing
- **1.0 - 1.9**: Not Recommended - Significant concerns, likely not feasible

## Decision

### Recommendation

- [ ] **APPROVE** - Proceed with implementation
- [ ] **APPROVE WITH CONDITIONS** - Proceed if conditions met
- [ ] **DEFER** - Good idea but not the right time
- [ ] **REJECT** - Not feasible or not aligned
